data: Check before meals, at HS and 0300h
Check before meals, snacks, at HS, midnight and 0300h
Check before meals and at HS
Check before meals, and at bedtime. If patient is on rapid-acting insulin multiple daily injections RN to notify provider of carbohydrates to be consumed prior to meal times, and at bedtime

Check before meals, at bedtime and 3 AM. If patient is on rapid-acting insulin multiple daily injections RN to notify provider of carbohydrates to be consumed prior to meal times , and at bedtime only

Check before meals, snacks and at bedtime. If patient is on rapid-acting insulin multiple daily injections RN to notify provider of carbohydrates to be consumed prior to meal times, snacks and at bedtime

Check before meals, snacks, at bedtime and 3 AM. If patient is on rapid-acting insulin multiple daily injections RN to notify provider of carbohydrates to be consumed prior to meal times, snacks and at bedtime only
